title: Pre-Service Teacher Mathematics Instructional Design Competency Development Program Based on Online Communities

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematics knowledge and no teaching experience
context.additional_context: Process where pre-service teachers engage in collaborative learning via online communities to develop mathematics instructional design, building practical competencies through self-directed material creation and feedback cycles

learning_goals: Preservice teachers can collaboratively develop and share five or more mathematics instructional design materials on an online community platform
Learners can improve the quality of instructional design by 20% through providing and incorporating peer feedback at least three times within the community
Participants can maintain weekly learning engagement at 80% or higher using a digital badge and activity metrics system

resources: Digital Tools for Mathematics Education (e.g., GeoGebra)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
